metadata.name: DOer Champion
metadata.description:
A DOer Champion holder shows that you are here for the mission and committed to the cause! Those who mint this NFT will forever be remembered as a champion of the genesis of Web3 Academy DAO.

Holders will receive: - A silver coloured name in the Web3 Academy Discord so all members can be reminded of your generosity - An airdrop of a mystery amount of $DOER tokens.

Thank you for your service DOer Champions!
